SETTINGS.Title: Configurações
SETTINGS.Region_explain: Data source and functions based on specific game version will be adjusted per region. Some of them may not be available in certain region.
SETTINGS.no_panel_borders: Desativar as bordas em torno de vários painéis
SETTINGS.Always_quit: Quit when clicking on close button (instead of minimizing)
SETTINGS.Auto_open_in_desktop: Abrir links na aplicação quando estiver iniciada
SETTINGS.Reset_password_warning: Tem a certeza que pretende repor a palavra-passe?
SETTINGS.Password_reset_mail_sent: Alteração da palavra-passe enviada para o seu email
SETTINGS.Nickname_used: Nome de utilizador já em utilização
SETTINGS.No_nickname_warning: Por favor vá à página de configurações e crie um nome de utilizador novo para aceder às funções exclusivas do patreon.
SETTINGS.Clear_cache: Limpar a cache (a app será reiniciada)
SETTINGS.Installing_npcap_description: In order to have packet capture working, we need to install npcap. Make sure you keep the default settings like they are (do not uncheck winpcap api compatibility). Teamcraft will restart once this is done.
SETTINGS.Show_copy_list_own_list: Mostrar botão de cópia em painéis de lista próprios
SETTINGS.Amount_display_mode: Modo de exibição de valores de lista
SETTINGS.Disable_cross_world_prices: Usar apenas o mundo próprio para preços do mercado
SETTINGS.Auto_mark_as_done_in_log: Mark items as done in log when they are done in a list
SETTINGS.Always_HQ_leves: Always count leves exp with HQ items
SETTINGS.Always_all_deliveries: Have the 'All 3 deliveries' button on the levequests page checked by default
SETTINGS.Disable_search_debounce: Disable search debounce (only pressing enter will trigger search)
SETTINGS.Enable_packet_capture: Enable packet capture (adds realtime inventory features)
SETTINGS.Packet_capture_info: Capturing packets is against ToS, the same reason why ACT is against ToS. But Square Enix tolerates it unless you brag about it to everyone ingame. Just don't and you won't risk anything.
SETTINGS.Enable_autofill_hq_filter: Only autofill using hq items when item is required as HQ
SETTINGS.Enable_autofill_nq_filter: Only autofill using nq items when item is not required as HQ
SETTINGS.Track_items_on_sale: Track items on sale in your retainers (requires restart/refresh)
SETTINGS.Always_disable_hq_suggestions: Always disable automatic HQ suggestions on lists
SETTINGS.Show_patch_notes_on_update: Show patch notes on new updates
SETTINGS.Scrolling_behavior_explain: Configure how scrolling in list panels behaves, default means allow up to 12 items per panel before scrolling.
SETTINGS.Enable_auto_log_check: Automatically check items as done in log when they are gathered/crafted
SETTINGS.Enable_metrics_capture_explain: (allows to capture analytics on your gil and items income, never uploaded to the server, this is only for you)
SETTINGS.Metrics_capture_tooltip: This feature will be added in a future update, but enabling the data capture now means that once it'll be here, you will have data starting now instead of when it's added to the app.
SETTINGS.Char_data_folder: Character data folder (where the CHRXXXXXXX folders are)
SETTINGS.Maximum_vendor_price_explain: Maximum price for an item to be caught by the CAN_BE_BOUGHT layout filter (0 = no maximum price)
SETTINGS.Rawsock_details: Using RawSocket captures the traffic without npcap, can help with VPNs. However, it's overall less reliable and you need to manually start TC as admin everytime
SETTINGS.Favorite_features_explain: The features you want to show in the favorites section of the sidebar.
SETTINGS.Switch_tc_when_switch_ingame_character: Switch Teamcraft character when switched ingame
SETTINGS.Show_other_characters_inventories_in_lis: Show other characters inventories in lists
SETTINGS.Alarm_panels_collapsed_by_default: Alarm group panels collapsed by default
SETTINGS.Alarm_groups_before_no_group: Show alarm groups before alarms with no group
SETTINGS.Import_error: Error while trying to import settings

PROFILE.User_not_verified: Utilizador não verificado, clique para o verificar
PROFILE.Autofill_stats_explain: Switch to the desired job in order to update it, close this popup once you're done. Please make sure you don't have any active food, else it'll save your stats with the food active.
PROFILE.Gearset_priority_explain: Used to decide which recipe to pick for items that can be crafted by multiple jobs like ingots, nuggets and other airship repair materials.

VERIFICATION.Error: Não foi possível encontrar o código na biografia da personagem, por favor certifique-se que o código foi aplicado e espere cerca de 30s para tentar novamente.

LIST_DETAILS.List_too_large_description: This list is too large and might slow down your computer or hit database limitations. To ensure you won't lose the list, you are no longer able to add further items to it unless existing items are removed.

SOLVER.Disclaimer: The solver is a work in progress, please keep in mind that it's not made to create perfect rotations, it's an AI trying to improve with time that can yield very bad results as well as very good ones. Please do not report bad results as bug.

COMMUNITY_ROTATIONS.Intro: Input some filters to get started
COMMUNITY_ROTATIONS.Result_tooltip: Result of a simulation run using this rotation and your stats
COMMUNITY_ROTATIONS.Specialist_rotation_warning: The result shown uses a non spec stat set for a spec rotation, which is why resulting HQ% might be way lower than expected.

FAIL_CAUSE.UNSAFE_ACTION: Unsafe action with safe mode enabled
FAIL_CAUSE.DURABILITY_REACHED_ZERO: Durability reached 0 before progression reached max
FAIL_CAUSE.MISSING_LEVEL_REQUIREMENT: You don't have required level to craft this item.
FAIL_CAUSE.NOT_SPECIALIST: Specialist rotation but you're not specialist
FAIL_CAUSE.NO_INNER_QUIET: Tried to use Inner Quiet action without Inner Quiet buff enabled
FAIL_CAUSE.MISSING_STATS_REQUIREMENT: You don't have the minimum stats needed for this craft

ROTATION_TIPS.Use_inner_quiet: Almost all the rotations should include Inner Quiet if your goal is to HQ the item. It provides a really good quality boost and enables actions like Byregot's Blessing.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_inner_quiet_before_quality_increase: You should apply Inner Quiet before any quality increase, not doing that means that you're wasting Inner Quiet stacks.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_byregot_blessing_high_iq_stacks: You used Byregot's Brow with more than 6 stacks. Using Byregot's Blessing is better in this case as it will produce more quality.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_observe_before_focused: You should use Observe before the Focused action at step {{index}} in order to get a free 100% success rate.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_durability_restoration_later: You should use the durability restoration action at step {{index}} later in order to avoid wasting durability restoration.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_patient_touch_faster: You should use Patient Touch before adding Inner Quiet stacks, in order to minimize wasted stacks if the action fails.
ROTATION_TIPS.Do_not_overlap_buffs: You overlapped the buff applied at step {{overlappedIndex}} with the buff applied at step {{overlappingIndex}}, you should delay the second one in order to get maximum benefits from your buffs.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_byregot_brow_5_stacks: You should use Byregot's Brow instead of Byregot's blessing for the same quality added but 6 less CP used.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_ingenuity_before_byregot: You should use Ingenuity before Byregot's action in order to get a boost on quality gain.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_more_quality_actions: You have remaining durability at the end of the craft, you should probably use it to add more quality-related actions.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_prudent_touch_manipulation: As you are level 66+, you should use Manipulation + Prudent Touch combo for quality gain in order to get maximum quality benefit ans more reliability.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_rapid_synthesis_earlier: You should not use Rapid Synthesis as a finisher action, putting it earlier in order to be able to handle the fail of the action is better for your rotation's reliability.
ROTATION_TIPS.Do_not_use_brand_without_name: Do not use Brand of the Elements without Name of the Elements active.
ROTATION_TIPS.Avoid_using_good_actions: Avoid using actions that require Good state in a macro, as they can't be predicted
ROTATION_TIPS.Requires_reuse_to_proc: Your rotation requires Reuse to proc in order to work properly, make sure it can work without a reuse proc.
ROTATION_TIPS.Use_reuse: Your rotation reaches 100% HQ and you have enough CP to use Reuse, consider adding it to get extra mats back.

INTRO.Third_line: You can also search by name, in case you know what you're looking for.

MARKETBOARD.Title: Marketboard Information
MARKETBOARD.Error: XIVAPI or Companion API is currently down, please wait a moment before retrying.

SEARCH_INTRO.Lists_created_counter: Foram criadas {{amount}} listas usando FFXIV Teamcraft

DESCRIPTION.Lists: Create lists to get informations about all materials, share them with your friends, everything starts here ! Just search for an item, expand filters to get specific items, and start crafting things.
DESCRIPTION.Public_lists: Clone lists created by the community that help you building things, levekits, log completion, airships, BiS gear, everything can be found here.
DESCRIPTION.Alarms: Crie alarmes para garantir que não perca um aparecimento de um node, organize-os em grupos, importe-os para o jogo, tudo é possível.
DESCRIPTION.Gathering_location: Encontre informações sobre qualquer item de colheita, crie um alarme, obtenha coordenadas instantâneas, aetheryte mais próximo, livro necessário e muito mais !
DESCRIPTION.Rotations: Create crafting rotations, test them inside the simulator, or theorycraft rotations using the custom simulator !
DESCRIPTION.Levequests: Find some levequests for a given job and/or level range, see instant benefit on them and create lists for them.
DESCRIPTION.Macro_translation: Got some macros but not in your language? Go to macro translator and translate it back to your language so it works in your ffxiv !

UPDATE.New_update_available_desktop:
A new update is available !
Click here to download and install it.
UPDATE.Web_instructions: Please reload the page to get the latest version.
UPDATE.Downloading_update: Downloading the update, you'll be prompted to install once the download is done
UPDATE.Possible_update_issue: It seems like your download is having an issue, please click this icon to download latest setup.

LOG_TRACKER.Title: Log Tracker
LOG_TRACKER.Mark_as_done_external: Mark this item as done inside the log
LOG_TRACKER.Mark_as_not_done: Marcar este item como não concluído
LOG_TRACKER.Create_list: Crie uma lista para completar esta página
LOG_TRACKER.Create_list_limited: Create a list to complete this page (50 items max)
LOG_TRACKER.Select_spot: Select a spot to see its details
LOG_TRACKER.MIN_optimized_path: Optimized path for all MIN nodes
LOG_TRACKER.BTN_optimized_path: Optimized path for all BTN nodes

Discord_1K.Title: Doação de 1000 membros do Discord!
Discord_1K.Description: Click on this banner to go to the registration page for the FINAL FANTASY XIV: Shadowbringers Collector's Edition giveaway created to celebrate the 1000 members cap reached on the discord server.

CRAFT.Title: Criado por
CRAFT.No_requirement_warning: You don't have any requirement setup for this item, it means that you are creating a craft with 0 ingredients.

IMPORT.Corrupted_file: Ficheiro de importação está corrupto ou tem um formato errado
IMPORT.Drag_or_click: Arraste para aqui o ficheiro ou clique para selecioná-lo

DIRTY.Dialog_description: Leaving this page will delete all your unsaved changes, are you sure?

GC_SUPPLY.Title: Aprovisionamentos da Grande Compania
GC_SUPPLY.Intro: Insira os seus níveis e clique Pesquisar para começar
GC_SUPPLY.Loading_message: A carregando possíveis entregas, pode demorar até um minuto

DESYNTH.Title: Desynth guide
DESYNTH.Intro: Select a job and input a level to find best items to level up your desynth

SUPPORT_US.Title: Help us grow !
SUPPORT_US.Communication_description:
Let people know about the tool, share rotations, lists. Create videos, blog posts, tweets, everything that lets more people know about Teamcraft really helps the project more than you would think.

We even prepared a macro for you so you can shout your love everywhere !
SUPPORT_US.Contribute_description:
You can find us on github to contribute to the project, even if you're a beginner, everybody is welcome !

But contributing isn't only about the code, feature requests and bug reports help the tool a lot by providing best quality content possible for everyone, thank to the people who take some time to stress test it and find bugs.
SUPPORT_US.Patreon_description:
Patreon is a platform where you can give a money to support a project every month. This money is used to pay for servers, certificates, giveaways and to free more and more time for the developer to work on the project.

Depending on the amount you pledge, you can get some nice benefits in order to thank your contribution:
SUPPORT_US.Popup_introduction:
Hi, I'm Miu, the developer of the tool you're currently using.
Teamcraft has been a hobby for me since the last few years and my dream is to make this my fulltime job.

With your help, this dream could become a reality, you can support the tool on patreon, every single dollar counts and will help me reach this goal.

Supporting the project on patreon also gives you some cool benefits:
SUPPORT_US.Already_supporting: Already a patreon supporter? Make sure you link your account to patreon in the settings

PATREON_BENEFITS.Discord_rank: Special rank on the discord server, giving you access to supporters channel to see what's we're working on (${{price}})
PATREON_BENEFITS.Profile_badge: Special badge on your Teamcraft profile (${{price}})
PATREON_BENEFITS.Custom_theme: Better theme customization, with custom color input (${{price}})
PATREON_BENEFITS.Pins_badge: Exclusive Teamcraft pins badge sent to you (${{price}}) (needs you to fill out shipment details on Patreon)
PATREON_BENEFITS.Loading_screen_message: Add a new entry inside the "Brought to you by ..." loading message, with your name, your FC name, LS name, whatever you want to add ! (${{price}})

DB.Crystal_used_for_everything: Demasiadas fórmulas (~ 1/6 das receitas do jogo)
DB.No_known_way_to_obtain: Couldn't find any ways to obtain this item
DB.Click_to_navigate: Click on the icon to open full item details
DB.Track_on_attt: Track on Another Triple Triad Tracker
DB.More_on_attt_npc: See more details about this npc on Another Triple Triad tracker
DB.Select_data_type: Select data types to show to see the details here

ITEM.Masterpiece_exp_tooltip: % of exp needed for next level

FISH.No_known_mooch_usage: No known mooch usage for this fish
FISH.Chances_for_transition: Chances for this transition to happen
FISH.Weather_chances: Chances for each weather to appear

ERRORS.No_bait: No bait detected, switch bait once to fix.
ERRORS.No_stats: No stats detected, switch to fisher again to fix.

COMMENTS.Title: Comments
COMMENTS.Editor_tip: Type <page type>:"<Content Name>" to create a link to another page. Examples: item:"Curtana", action:"Basic Synthesis", map:"The Crystarium".Supported page types: item, map, mob, achievement, leve, npc, instance, quest, trait, action, status

PATCH.Open_patch_page: Click here to open full patch changes in database

SEARCH_TYPES.Leve_info_message: You can use the levequests page to prepare levekits and compute exp reward for your leves

RECIPE_FINDER.Title: Recipe finder
RECIPE_FINDER.Description: Input the items you have and click "Find recipes" to get a list of possible recipes to craft and easily generate a crafting list from the results.
RECIPE_FINDER.Extension_tip: You can copy your retainer's inventory to your clipboard using the inventory grabber extension:
RECIPE_FINDER.Extension_link: Get the extension on chrome webstore
RECIPE_FINDER.Clipboard_import_duplicates: Items that show twice are here because lodestone shows stacks, so they are inside your retainer as separate stacks.
RECIPE_FINDER.Shown_only_craftable: Only what I have level for

CURRENCY_SPENDING.Title: Currency Spending guide
CURRENCY_SPENDING.Description: Got too much of a currency? Select your currency, set an amount, a server and find which item is the best to buy to get gil from your currencies !
CURRENCY_SPENDING.Disabled: The currency spending guide isn't working anymore
CURRENCY_SPENDING.Disabled_description: This is due to Square Enix stopping us from fetching marketboard informations, if you want to complain about this, please complain to Square Enix, there is nothing we can do to make this work without them.

FOOD_PICKER.Title: Food Picker
FOOD_PICKER.Description: You want to know which food will give the stats you want ? Look no further, you're where you need to be!

ERRORS.Http_request_error: There is an issue with {{tool}}, please wait a moment and try again. If the issue persists, check #announcements in the Teamcraft Discord server for updates.
ERRORS.Firebase_blocked: Teamcraft could not reach the database, it seems like something is blocking it or you don't have access to internet.

SEARCH.Search_tip: You can type patch:<patch #> to filter on a given patch, example: patch:5.01
SEARCH.Stats_exclude_tip: Set min value of a stat to -1 to search for items without this stat
SEARCH.Bonuses_exclude_tip: Set min value of a bonus to -1 to search for items without this bonus

PACKET_CAPTURE.Banner_description: You can enable packet capture to allow Teamcraft to read your FFXIV packets (a checkbox is also inside settings to enable/disable it), this allows to autofill lists as you obtain items, and to contribute data to Universalis, the marketboard aggragator.
PACKET_CAPTURE.Banner_description_warning: Packet capture is against ToS, which is why it's disabled by default, please make sure to avoid telling everybody ingame and you'll be fine.
PACKET_CAPTURE.Empty_inventory: Your inventory hasn't been loaded yet
PACKET_CAPTURE.Please_zone: Please teleport to a random location and open your chocobo saddlebag once you are arrived to initialize the inventory system properly.
PACKET_CAPTURE.Please_sort: Inventory tracking cannot work without knowing which character you're currently playing, please sort/unsort your inventory or log in with your character to have Teamcraft detect your current character.
PACKET_CAPTURE.Please_relog: In order to contribute to Universalis, we need you to log out and in (ingame), this is only needed once.
PACKET_CAPTURE.Please_update_inventory_popup: Please change zone (by either teleporting or entering a house) in order to update your inventory. This popup will close once it's done. If this issue persists, try the packet capture troubleshooting guide in the pinned messages of #troubleshooting in the Teamcraft Discord server.
PACKET_CAPTURE.Outdated_description: Your version of Teamcraft isn't working properly with the current game version, it's being worked on and will be fixed in a future update.
PACKET_CAPTURE.Possible_missing_firewall_rule_descripti: Teamcraft only sees some of the packets and is missing the ones related to inventories, stats, gear, etc, this may be due to a missing firewall rule on your PC.
PACKET_CAPTURE.Possible_missing_firewall_rule_check: If this message doesn't disappear after you teleport to a new area, the firewall rule is missing or packet capture is not working at all for another reason (if it's the case, join the discord server and go to #troubleshooting channel).
PACKET_CAPTURE.Rawsock_needs_admin: RawSocket capture mode requires admin permissions
PACKET_CAPTURE.Rawsock_needs_admin_description: In order to manipulate firewall rules properly and be able to capture traffic from your game, RawSocket mode requires TC to have admin permissions. You can close it and run it again as admin to fix this issue, or pick one of the options below.
PACKET_CAPTURE.Install_npcap: Npcap is missing from your system
PACKET_CAPTURE.Install_npcap_description: In order to have Teamcraft capture packet with its default npcap mode, you need to install npcap. Teamcraft can install it for you and restart the app once it's done.

SUGGESTED_REGION.Banner_description: You can change the region to which you played in for better experience in database, simulator, packet capture, etc.

INVENTORY.Title: Inventory
INVENTORY.Click_to_add_to_progression: Click to add to item progression

CONTENT_ID_POPUP.Description: In order to support multi-character tracking and other nice features, Teamcraft needs to know which character you're currently playing on, or at least which character should be linked to the current ingame one.
CONTENT_ID_POPUP.Linked_tooltip: This character is already linked to another ingame character, selecting it will delete the link with the other character
CONTENT_ID_POPUP.Override_link_confirmation: Are you sure you want to override this link?
CONTENT_ID_POPUP.You_can_reset_ignore: You can reset ignored characters in the settings page, Desktop section
CONTENT_ID_POPUP.Tip: If you already linked the character you're currently playing on, you can safely ignore this character, Teamcraft reads file changes and some files could be changing for whatever reason, triggering this if the file isn't associated yet.

INVENTORY_OPTIMIZER.Title: Inventory optimizer
INVENTORY_OPTIMIZER.Ignore_item: Ignore this tip for this item
INVENTORY_OPTIMIZER.Remove_ignore_item: Don't ignore this tip for this item anymore
INVENTORY_OPTIMIZER.Ignore_container: Ignore this tip for this container
INVENTORY_OPTIMIZER.Remove_ignore_container: Don't ignore this tip for this container anymore

CAN_BE_BOUGHT.Title: Items that can be bought with gil
CAN_BE_BOUGHT.Message: This item can be bought from NPCs with gil and does not require beast tribe reputation.

DUPLICATES.Title: Items that are duplicated across multiple containers
DUPLICATES.Message: This item is also present in: {{containers}}.

HAS_TOO_FEW.Title: Items that you have in very small stacks
HAS_TOO_FEW.Message: You only have {{amount}} of this item, is it worth keeping them?

CONSOLIDATE_STACKS.Title: HQ stacks of items that can have their quality lowered

UNWANTED_MATERIALS.Title: Old materials that are only used to make low iLvl items
UNWANTED_MATERIALS.Message: The highest resulting ilvl that this material can be used to craft is {{ilvl}}

CAN_BE_GATHERED_EASILY.Title: Items that can be gathered easily
CAN_BE_GATHERED_EASILY.Message: Can be gathered at level {{level}} on a non-timed node

CAN_EXTRACT_MATERIA.Title: Gear you can extract materia from (100% spiritbond)
CAN_EXTRACT_MATERIA.Message: You can extract a materia from this gear piece

USELESS_HQ.Title: Items you don't need HQ because you can use Trained Eye
USELESS_HQ.Message: This item is only used in recipes that you can use Trained Eye on, making it useless to have it HQ

VERSION_LOCK.Outdated: You are using an outdated version of Teamcraft that cannot work properly anymore
VERSION_LOCK.Refresh_or_download_latest: If you're using the website, simple press Ctrl + F5 to refresh entirely, if you're using desktop app, download latest here:

GEARSETS.Title: Gearsets
GEARSETS.Warning_job_switch: Switching job will remove crystal, main hand and off hand, including materias. Please take note of them before switching if you want to use the same melds.
GEARSETS.Import_from_pcap_notice: Switch to the desired gearset with the corresponding job to import it.
GEARSETS.Clone_gearset_from_sync: Create a copy of this gearset
GEARSETS.Include_all_tools: Include tools for the other jobs too
GEARSETS.Use_in_simulator: Use these stats in the simulator
GEARSETS.Stat_computing_diclaimer: Results are not 100% accurate, they are from players (the allagan studies) like you and me who spend a lot of time trying to figure the formulas, please do not report inaccuracies as bug.
GEARSETS.Missing_items: It looks like you're missing some slots, make sure your filters are properly set
GEARSETS.Create_commission: Create a commission for this gearset

COMPARISON.Error_description: Please make sure the gearset you entered exists and is the same type as the current one (same main stat)
COMPARISON.External_gearset: A Teamcraft gearset from someone else

SYNC.Title: Synchronize gearsets
SYNC.Tag_tooltip: This gearset is from a synchronization operated using packet capture, it'll be updated if you synchronize again for this job.

POPUP.Title: Welcome to FFXIV Teamcraft
POPUP.Explanation: Teamcraft has a small tutorial on how to use it's basic features and functionality. It will appear in the form of small windows and pop-ups on various pages throughout the app.
POPUP.Question: Would you like to enable this functionality?
POPUP.Can_be_changed_in_settings: Can be switched on or off inside the settings

APP.Profile: Hover your name to access profile editor and configure your levels, your stats, and more.

SEARCH.Search_type: You can change the type of data you're looking for here (Item, Quest, Map, Node, NPC, etc).
SEARCH.Share: Use this button to get your search results as a shareable link.
SEARCH.Filters: Open this panel to use advanced filters, to filter by stat, bonus, ilvl, and more

LIST_PANEL.Share: Click here to copy a link to this list, to easily share it
LIST_PANEL.Open_list: Click here to open the list's detail, you can also double click list's name.
LIST_PANEL.More: Click this menu to rename the list, manage permissions, and more.

LIST.HQ_mark: This icon means that this item is required for a final recipe, you might want it HQ, but aren't forced to.
LIST.Layout: You can edit the display entirely, change panels and how they filter data by opening the layout editor. The button on the left of this one is used as a quick layout switch.
LIST.Permissions: You can edit permissions, add other users, make your list readonly, share it to a FC, and more, by opening the permission editor.
LIST.Fill_with_inventory: You can add everything that's inside your inventory inside this list.
LIST.Pricing_mode_button: Easily prepare and predict your benefits for this list using the pricing mode.
LIST.More_actions_button: This button opens a menu with a lot of different actions for the current list row. You can convert these actions to buttons using the layout editor.
LIST.Alarm_button: Click here to create an alarm for this item, to be alerted when it spawns.

LISTS.Merge: You can merge two lists using the merge button.
LISTS.Import: You can import lists from various websites such as ariyala, craftingasaservce and garlandtools.

DB.Button: Clicking this information button opens the database page containing details on the thing it's next to (npc name, map, item, monster, etc). For items, clicking on the icon also opens database page.

DESYNTH.Job: Select the job you want to level
DESYNTH.Level: Input the desynth level (not the actual job level)

RESET_TIMERS.Toggle: Enable alarms for a given timer by setting this switch to ON.

SIMULATOR.Character_configuration: Configure your level and your stats here.
SIMULATOR.HQ_ingredients: Input HQ ingredients here to set a starting quality.
SIMULATOR.Consumables: Configure consumables and FC buffs here.
SIMULATOR.Right_click_condition: Right click on an action to set its condition (good, excellent, poor, fail, etc) and predict the results.
SIMULATOR.Save_as_new: Click here to save a copy of this rotation in your account.
SIMULATOR.Import_ingame_macro: Click here to import from ingame macro.
SIMULATOR.Generate_ingame_macro: Click here to generate an ingame macro for this rotation.
SIMULATOR.Share_with_stats: Click here to open the share popup, allowing you to share with your stats and consumables.

ALARMS.Settings: Click here to edit alarms settings (sound, volume, etc).
ALARMS.Custom: Click here to create a custom alarm.
ALARMS.Compact: Click here to toggle alarms' compact display.

COMMUNITY_ROTATIONS.Text_filter: Use this input field to find a rotation using its name
COMMUNITY_ROTATIONS.Tags_filter: Filter by tags using this select box
COMMUNITY_ROTATIONS.Rlvl_filter: Filter by recipe level using this select box
COMMUNITY_ROTATIONS.Durability_filter: Filter by durability using this select box
COMMUNITY_ROTATIONS.Min_craftsmanship: Filter by minimum craftsmanship required here, this will find only rotations with required craftsmanship < your value.
COMMUNITY_ROTATIONS.Min_control: Filter by minimum control required here, this will find only rotations with required control < your value.
COMMUNITY_ROTATIONS.Min_cp: Filter by minimum cp required here, this will find only rotations with required cp < your value.
COMMUNITY_ROTATIONS.Set_selector: Select which job should be used for the simulations used to show success rate of the result rotations.

METRICS.Welcome_time_range: Welcome to the metrics dashboard page, here you can select the time range for which you want to see data displayed, it defaults to today.
METRICS.Select_dashboard: You can have multiple dashboards and easily cycle between them to see what's important for you.
METRICS.Edit_dashboard: You can enter edit mode using this button, it's only available for non-default dashboards.
METRICS.Create_dashboard: Create your own dashboards easily, don't forget to edit them after you created them, else it'll just be a copy of the default dashboard.
METRICS.Delete_layout: Want to get rid of a dashboard, press this button, confirm, and poof (deletion cannot be reverted).
METRICS.Export_layout: Want to share your amazing dashboard with your mates? Click this button to copy the export code for your currently selected dashboard.
METRICS.Import_layout: If someone shares a dashboard with you using the export code, use this button to import it.

EDITOR.Welcome_add_column: Welcome to the dashboard layout editor, you can add columns using this button (up to 5 columns).
EDITOR.Save: Don't forget to save your modifications after you edited your dashboard.
EDITOR.Revert: Or if you don't like what you did, use this to go back to the original layout you had before editing it.
EDITOR.Delete_column: Want to remove a column? Here it is !
EDITOR.Add_panel: Click here to add a new panel.
EDITOR.Reorder: You can use drag and drop to move panels anywhere you want.
EDITOR.Data_type: First of all, select the metric type you want to use.
EDITOR.Filters: Then, filter the data to only use what you want to show, with the ability to combine and invert filters.
EDITOR.Title: Set a title for your panel
EDITOR.Display_type: Select which component you want to use to represent your data, and add the inputs accordingly.

METRICS.Title: Metrics dashboard
METRICS.Import_failed: Dashboard import failed, the code is invalid
METRICS.Nothing_to_show_description: Make sure you selected a period in which TC captured data and check that this option is enabled (inside settings -> desktop -> Enable metrics capture)

EDITOR.Title: Title
EDITOR.Cannot_edit_default: You can't edit default layout, create a new layout to customize it instead

FILTER_TIPS.FishFilter: Accept only fishes coming from fishing spots
FILTER_TIPS.ItemFilter: Accepts only a given set of items
FILTER_TIPS.SourceFilter: Accepts only a given set of sources

ITEM_SEARCH_OVERLAY.Intro_message: Search for an item to see details about it, inventory and marketboard informations
ITEM_SEARCH_OVERLAY.None_inside_inventory: This item is not in any inventories.

CRAFTING_REPLAYS.Title: Crafting replays
CRAFTING_REPLAYS.Copy_to_clipboard: Copy share link to your clipboard
CRAFTING_REPLAYS.Missing_stats: Please switch to any crafting job to let TC know about your stats before it can record anything.

COMMISSIONS.No_commissions_as_client: You don't have any commission as client
COMMISSIONS.No_commissions_as_crafter: You're not working on any commission
COMMISSIONS.No_archived_commissions_as_client: You have no archived commission as client
COMMISSIONS.No_archived_commissions_as_crafter: You have no archived commissions as crafter

CREATION.Name: Name
CREATION.Price_tip: Input 0 if you want people to suggest how much they want instead
CREATION.Includes_materials_label: This commission includes all base materials and requires only crafting
CREATION.Only_requires_materials: This commission only requires materials for this list
CREATION.Contact_info_placeholder: How can the contractors contact you once they are accepted for the commission? Discord, ingame, email, as you want.
CREATION.Description_placeholder: If you want to give more details about your commission, it's here
CREATION.Warning_description: Creating troll/spam commissions will result in the commission being deleted and possible action against your account.
CREATION.Copy_link_tooltip: Gives you the url to open to create this exact commission, useful for guides writing.

BOARD.Title: Commission board
BOARD.Tracking_tip: You can get notifications for new commissions on your datacenter using the official discord server's commissions section

DETAILS.Progression_Tip: Once the list completion is 100%, you'll be able to mark this commission as completed
DETAILS.Bump: Bring this commission back to the top, only once per 24h
DETAILS.Share_link_copied: Commission share link copied to your clipboard
DETAILS.Comment_placeholder: Add more details about your rating here

APPLY.Contact_info_placeholder: How can the client contact you to talk about your application if needed? Discord, ingame, email, as you want.

CONTRACT_ENDED_CONTRACTOR.Title: Commission contract ended
CONTRACT_ENDED_CONTRACTOR.Content: You are no longer the contractor for commission {{name}}

CONTRACT_ENDED_CLIENT.Title: Commission contract ended
CONTRACT_ENDED_CLIENT.Content: Contractor for commission {{name}} is no longer assigned

HIRED.Title: Commission contract started
HIRED.Content: You have been hired on commission {{name}}

DONE.Title: Commission list completed
DONE.Content: List associated with commission {{name}} has been completed

FIRED.Please_pick_reason: Why are you firing this contractor?
FIRED.NO_ACTIVE_SUB: Contractor no longer has active subscription.
FIRED.UNCOMFORTABLE_WITH_CONTRACTOR: No longer comfortable working with this contractor.
FIRED.FOUND_SOMEONE_ELSE: Found another contractor for this commission.

RESIGNED.Please_pick_reason: Why are you resigning from this commission?
RESIGNED.NO_ACTIVE_SUB: I no longer have active subscription.
RESIGNED.UNCOMFORTABLE_WITH_CLIENT: No longer comfortable working with the client.
RESIGNED.CANNOT_COMPLETE_LEVEL: I cannot complete this commission due to level requirements I don't meet.
RESIGNED.CANNOT_COMPLETE_CONTENT: I cannot complete this commission because I don't have access to the content it requires (example: I don't have the latest expansion).
RESIGNED.CANNOT_GATHER: I am not capable of collecting required items. Client will not collect items.

IMPORT.Title: Commission import
IMPORT.Description: Please check that these items are the ones you want to create a commission for. Note: items that cannot be traded are removed from the list below automatically.

MAPPY.Only_missing_nodes: Only show maps with missing nodes

LEVELING_EQUIPMENT.Title: Leveling Equipment
LEVELING_EQUIPMENT.Description: Select the job and the level you want to equip, set your filters and click search to find equipment to level your jobs
LEVELING_EQUIPMENT.In_inventory: You have this item inside one of your inventories
LEVELING_EQUIPMENT.Interactions_description: Click on a level to select the entire column, click on an item box to select it, and click the delete icon to deselect an item without replacing it.

RETAINERS.Title: Retainers
RETAINERS.No_retainers: No retainers, please ring the retainers bell to load informations about your retainers.

RETAINER_VENTURES.Title: Retainer ventures
RETAINER_VENTURES.Description: Input your retainer job, level, ilvl and gathering (if needed) to find the ideal task to run for profit. This can take up to a minute if your retainer is high level because it'll consider every single item it can obtain for profit.
